QuestData.Title: The Tinkertoss Twins
QuestData.Description: Commander, two gnomish smugglers passed by while you were out - Filbert and Dilbert Tinkertoss. They were headed towards the bog to the east.$B$BThey had all sorts of drilling equipment but didn't seem to have any weapons.$B$BWhat do you think of offering them protection in exchange for some of their materials?$B$BI'll jot down where they were headed in case you decide to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Filbert Tinkertoss in Murkbog.
